name: Escape from Mars (lenchik_spiridonchik)
description:
My new game. 3D shooter on the Mars!

Let's play right now!

You need to kill the enemies. and find the finisg gate. The game has different pickups for easier passage of the game.

Added two new levels, some changes in menu, description on site. 

If something went wrong, don't forget to allow cookies (upper right corner in Google Chrome)

Created by Leonid Spiridonov
